languages.text: "Публично вырвите голосовые связки и языки всем хулившим Вольного Торговца и замените их вокс-имплантами, непрерывно восхваляющими имя {name} фон Валанциус. Надеюсь, это поможет им запомнить, кто здесь главный".

traits.locale_text: "Публично вырвите голосовые связки и языки всем хулившим Вольного Торговца, и замените их вокс-имплантами, непрерывно восхваляющими имя {name} фон Валанциус. Надеюсь, это поможет им запомнить кто здесь главный".

languages.text: "Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."
languages.original_text: "Публично вырвите голосовые связки и языки всем хулившим Вольного Торговца и замените их вокс-имплантами, непрерывно восхваляющими имя {name} фон Валанциус. Надеюсь, это поможет им запомнить, кто здесь главный".

traits.locale_text: "Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

"Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

"Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

"Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

languages.text: “凡是胆敢诽谤我的人，公开切掉他们的声带和舌头，替换成音阵植入物，让他们一刻不停地赞美行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。这样一来，应该就可以提醒所有人，这个世界的统治者是谁。”
languages.original_text: "Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

traits.locale_text: “凡是胆敢诽谤我的人，公开切掉他们的声带和舌头，替换成音阵植入物，让他们一刻不停地赞美行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。这样一来，应该就可以提醒所有人，这个世界的统治者是谁。”

languages.text: «Arranque públicamente las cuerdas vocales y las lenguas de todos los calumniadores y sustitúyalos por vocos que cantan las alabanzas de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius constantemente. Creo que eso bastará como recordatorio de quién gobierna este mundo».
languages.original_text: "Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

traits.locale_text: «Arranque públicamente las cuerdas vocales y las lenguas de todos los calumniadores y sustitúyalos por vocos que cantan las alabanzas de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius constantemente. Creo que eso bastará como recordatorio de quién gobierna este mundo».

languages.text: 「悪評を広める者の声帯と舌を公共の場で切除し、自由開拓者である{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスを絶え間なく称えるヴォクス・インプラントと交換するが良い。そこまですれば、誰がこの惑星を統治しているのかを、しかと覚えることができるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

traits.locale_text: 「悪評を広める者の声帯と舌を公共の場で切除し、自由開拓者である{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスを絶え間なく称えるヴォクス・インプラントと交換するが良い。そこまですれば、誰がこの惑星を統治しているのかを、しかと覚えることができるだろう」

languages.text: "Reißt allen Verleumdern öffentlich Stimmbänder und Zunge heraus und ersetzt sie durch Vox-Implantate, die ohne Unterbrechung ein Loblied auf {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius singen. Das dürfte ausreichen als Erinnerung, wer diese Welt beherrscht."
languages.original_text: "Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

traits.locale_text: "Reißt allen Verleumdern öffentlich Stimmbänder und Zunge heraus und ersetzt sie durch Vox-Implantate, die ohne Unterbrechung ein Loblied auf {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius singen. Das dürfte ausreichen als Erinnerung, wer diese Welt beherrscht."

languages.text: « Arrachez publiquement les cordes vocales et la langue de tous les calomniateurs, puis remplacez-les par des implants vox qui chantent les louanges {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius jour et nuit. Ainsi, tout le monde se rappellera qui règne sur ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

traits.locale_text: « Arrachez publiquement les cordes vocales et la langue de tous les calomniateurs, puis remplacez-les par des implants vox qui chantent les louanges {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius jour et nuit. Ainsi, tout le monde se rappellera qui règne sur ce monde. »

languages.text: "Her bir iftiracıyı bulun, ses tellerini ve dillerini herkesin önünde yırtın, yerlerine de durmadan Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius adına methiyeler dizen voks implantları yerleştirin. Bu dünyaya kimin hükmettiğini herkes hatırlamalı."
languages.original_text: "Publicly rip out the vocal cords and tongues of every slanderer and replace them with vox-implants that sing the praises of Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius without interruption. I should think that will serve as a reminder of who rules this world."

traits.locale_text: "Her bir iftiracıyı bulup, ses tellerini ve dillerini herkesin önünde yırtıp, yerlerine durmadan Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius adına methiyeler dizen voks implantlar yerleştirin. Bu dünyaya kimin hükmettiğini herkes hatırlamalı."
